author: bmahakud
body:
- Creating new pull request to upload MVA weight files trained 
- The weight files for which training was done with deep flavor had been uploaded and merged few days back in the PR https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/issues/4824
- The previous training was performed using the deep flavor of the closest jet. However it is not straightforward to implement this in cmssw, so we roll back to using csv
- So the other PR #4 will be reverted.
title: Uploading new MVA weight files (with csv) : (muon POG)
